summary:
I started my journey as a Software Test Engineer and I have an experience of more than 9 years in the software industry. Initially, I worked in the waterfall model, and then a few years back I was introduced to the world of Agile. I was thrilled by the concept of servant leadership in agile software development. With this newly found knowledge, I started supporting my team and then become a full-time Scrum Master. I am very passionate about agile development and I would like to share this passion with others.
So far I have learned that while improving individuals or a team, one can improve themselves.

treasury_media.title: Priyanka Gorai: Creating a support community for Scrum Masters as a change leadership action!
treasury_media.description: This is a story of how the Scrum Masters in an organization came together to learn and practice coaching with each other. The community of practice they created helped the Agile adoption change progress in that company, but also supported the Scrum...

ISTQB® Certified Tester Foundation Level (CTFL)

projects.title: TIBCO Testing Tool Automation
projects.description: Business want to migrate from one portfolio to another, so it needed an automation tool  to test if the TIBCO services are working as per the business after the migration.

projects.title: BAU Onsite Projects Testing
projects.description:
NI - Network International is one of the largest processor in Dubai which handles Credit Card processing middle east banks. Onsite BAU UAT team supports many interface testing like BASE24, POS, PRM, Prepaid Card System, TIBCO etc. and support Offshore team for Authorizations 
POS Testing:
•	Worked on POS Application Upgrade testing projects.
•	Tested different Scheme and Transaction Types combinations.
•	Worked on M-POS and ECR authorization testing with different Scheme.
•	Tested POS authorization project with BASE24(Switch), Vision Plus (Host) interfaces and way4 interfaces.
•	Tested BAU issue. 
TIBCO Testing:
•	Worked on TIBCO simulator to test vision plus functionalities.
•	Verification of TIBCO logs for all type of requests.
•	Worked with ENBD Group IT for JDBC migration and testing support for their API enhancement.
•	Worked for ADCB Touchpoint functionality.
Scheme Simulator
•	Worked on VISA and MC simulators to perform AUTH for all Vision plus and way4 clients.
•	Details analysis to create scripts for AUTH testing within simulator.
•	Compliance testing for scheme changes using simulators.
PRM
•	Worked on PRM application to validate rules.
•	Deployment of rules and validating same against the client requirement.
•	PRM Rule testing for both issuing and acquiring.
Base24
•	Worked on base24 and adapted basics of application.
•	AUTH Performance, validation in base24 audit logs.
•	Extraction of PTLF and TLF files.

projects.title: ENBD XLS Phase 3
projects.description:
Emirates NBD Bank wanted to use only Welcome Real Time (WRT) loyalty system (XLS) for rewards management for all of its portfolios (Credit/Debit Cards) which were present across different systems (VisionPlus/ Finacle). To consolidate this in WRT system, NI performed the below activities:
• Migration of existing rewards program/Points from V+ to WRT.
• Automating of accrual of Bonus POINTS which used to be done manually out of the V+ System 
• Building the enhanced Redemption Capabilities for ENBD in XLS w.r.t. to current MTS system.
• Change of existing WRT Functionalities to accommodate the new requirements
• Change of existing POS Functionalities to accommodate the new Requirements

profile_positions.description:
ASML is the world's leading provider of lithography systems for the semiconductor industry, manufacturing complex machines that are critical to the production of integrated circuits or chips. ​​
Development and Engineering (D&E) is the largest sector in the ASML organization with engineers who have a range of backgrounds including physics, electronics, me​​chatronics, software, mechanics, data analytics and more.​ 
- As a scrum master in  Scaled Agile frameworks (SAFe), I need to ensure timely delivery of committed items on the backlog of two Scrum teams 
- To lead, build and facilitate both the teams to become high performing
- To create transparency and alignment on team speed, quality of deliverables and happiness
- To signal and remove impediments to ensure timely delivery from the scrum teams
- To ensures the team follows the technical way of working and ensures quality related to own discipline is secured in the team
- To manage suppliers and outsourcing execution (rituals)
- To creates focus in the team by shielding them from external interferences
- To provides analyses of current team rituals, evaluates bottlenecks and advice regarding improvements in team rituals
- To helps the people around the team to understand which interaction with the team is helpful or not
- To ensure dependencies and risks are managed by the team
- To ensure the pre-conditions are in place to start a work item (Definition of Ready)
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master (D&E)

profile_positions.description:
Vanderlande is the global market leader for future-proof logistic process automation at airports.  The company is also a leading supplier of process automation solutions for warehouses and in the parcel market.
In the R&D department, we work on the development of advanced logistical material handling products, which are often complex mechatronic systems. In essence, we improve existing products and develop new ones. This also includes researching new technologies, working with technology partners, carrying out feasibility studies, and building proof of concepts.  
Our department works in multidisciplinary project teams on mechatronic solutions, that involve mechanical, computer and software, electronic and control system engineering.
- As a scrum master, I am organizing and facilitating all sprint cadences (planning, reviews, retrospective, and standups) for two software teams in  Scaled Agile frameworks (SAFe).
- Assisting product owners and product managers in preparing and refining the backlog for Program Increment (large scale planning) as well as Sprint planning.
- Accountable alongside the Scrum and Kanban teams for the achievement of release objectives and results that meet internal as well as external stakeholder's needs and expectations.
- Facilitating discussion leading to collective decision-making, goal setting, and conflict resolution within the team.
- Communicate and report team progress and accomplishments ensuring transparency of progress and outcomes
- Improved team performance by identifying, managing, and supporting the resolution of team impediments.
- Onboarded and trained new team members on the agile mindset, processes, and frameworks.
profile_positions.title: Scrum Master (R&D)

profile_positions.description:
UL is a premier global independent safety science company with more than 127 years of history. I was part of the UL’s Identity Management and Security Division.
- Worked as the servant leader for a team that has members around the globe which consists of a unique combination of engineers, scientists, and domain experts.
- My team worked on software and hardware that was used to ensure security and interoperability within the world of electronic transactions.
- Worked with scrum team, product owners, and leadership to organize, facilitate and complete the sprint activities.
- Eliminated impediments and facilitate a team’s optimum performance.
 - Kept the team focused on the sprint priorities, business values and protected the team from over-committing.
 - Worked with product owner during sprint review sessions to make sure all stories met the Definition of Done and get the stories accepted within the sprint.
 - Performed and improved test activities on test tools, consisting of desktop, web-based and mobile software (and specialized hardware), are used by major payment industry players in order to test systems and devices, such as data processing systems, mobile devices, point-of-sale terminals, ATMs and SIM cards:
•	Planned, configured, and tested test tools 
•	Managed and executed self-qualification testing for the test tools 
•	Improved quality of the products by creating an organized agile testing process
profile_positions.title: Technical Analyst and Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
KRA:
• Estimation & Planning:
- Analyze BRD, FSD and provide accurate estimates for test conditions, planning and execution efforts 
- Independently create DTP, Execution Plan & strategy
- Ensure availability of all deliverables with appropriate review logs
- Participate and drive the client walkthroughs for the Test Plan
• Execution and Tracking:
- Understand, execute and verify given test plan/scripts and identify defects and raise the same as per process
- Document all test results with a clear explanation
- Understand data requirements for test plans, follow the batch plan/test execution plan, and condition data accordingly
- Monitor and Track Project Execution and manage client liaison
- Ensure availability of all deliverables with appropriate review logs
- Risk assessment and mitigation
- Oversee project implementation and generate closure report
- Coordinate with project stakeholders (client and internal)
- Monitor and control scope creep and change management
- Detailed Test Metrics creation and support to QA
- Ensure that the resources in the team execute all the planned conditions daily and upload the relevant OTRs  in the Test Management tool(HP QC/ JIRA etc)
• Strategic Initiatives:
- Backup for Lead
- Support for test tool development
- Create knowledge repositories with test leads and promote reusability
- Promote knowledge sharing and conduct such sessions
- Should provide extensive support to QA Lead and TL for all CMMI related initiatives and process requirements
• Functional Competency:
- Prepare Test Plan for new functionalities
- Learn & Execute test cases for new functionalities
• Communication & Interpersonal Skills:
- Exhibit adequate and clear articulation in verbal and written communication
- Exhibit effective Presentation skills
• Mentoring & Organization Support:
- Groom Junior resources in the team
- Assist Recruitment team by conducting functional interviews
- Assist pre-sales team by providing case studies in proposals preparation
